name: iron sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp edge.

name: crystal ball
description: A shiny crystal ball that glows with a faint light.

name: steel sword
description: A sturdy steel sword with a sharp edge.

name: wooden shield
description: A basic wooden shield that provides some protection.

name: leather cap
description: A simple leather cap that offers minimal protection.

name: copper amulet
description: A simple amulet made of copper.

name: padded tunic
description: A padded tunic that offers some protection.

name: traveler's cloak
description: A warm cloak that keeps you dry in the rain.

name: leather bracers
description: Protective bracers made of hardened leather.

name: leather gloves
description: Simple gloves that protect your hands.

name: silver ring
description: A simple silver ring.

name: leather belt
description: A sturdy leather belt with a brass buckle.

name: leather leggings
description: Protective leggings made of leather.

name: leather boots
description: Sturdy boots for long travels.

name: broken rusty sword
description: A severely damaged sword with a rusty blade. It looks like it might break with a few more hits.

name: iron shortsword
description: A standard-issue iron shortsword. Nothing special, but it gets the job done.

name: fine steel longsword
description: A well-crafted longsword made of quality steel. The edge is sharp and the balance is excellent.

name: enchanted elven blade
description: A rare elven blade with faint blue runes etched along its length. The metal seems to shimmer in the light.

name: dragonfire greatsword
description: A magnificent greatsword that radiates heat. The blade is forged from a dragon's tooth and enchanted with fire magic.

name: worldender
description: A legendary blade said to have been forged by the gods themselves. The very air around it seems to distort with power.

name: chipped stone axe
description: A primitive axe with a chipped stone head. Barely better than a rock tied to a stick.

name: woodcutter's axe
description: A simple axe designed for chopping wood, but it works well enough in combat.

name: fine dwarven handaxe
description: A well-balanced handaxe of dwarven make. The edge gleams with sharpness.

name: frostbite battleaxe
description: A rare battleaxe that glistens with frost. The edge seems to freeze the air around it.

name: thunderlord's cleaver
description: A massive axe that crackles with lightning. Each swing sounds like distant thunder.

name: godcleaver
description: A legendary axe rumored to have once cleaved a mountain in two. It pulses with divine energy.

name: venom dagger
description: A dagger coated in deadly poison.

name: shock mace
description: A mace crackling with electrical energy.

name: healing potion
description: A red potion that restores health.

name: mana potion
description: A blue potion that restores mana.

name: Healing Potion
description: A small vial of red liquid.

name: Iron Sword
description: A standard iron sword.

name: The One Ring
description: A plain gold ring that seems to whisper dark secrets. One ring to rule them all.

name: wooden torch
description: A simple torch wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. Provides light in dark places.

name: hemp rope
description: A coil of sturdy hemp rope, useful for climbing or tying things.

name: trail rations
description: Dried meat, hard bread, and nuts packed for travel. Enough for several days.

name: mug of ale
description: A frothy mug of brown ale. It might not heal you, but it makes everything seem better.

name: rat tail
description: A severed rat tail. Gross, but some alchemists pay for these.

name: boar tusk
description: A sharp tusk from a wild boar. Could be crafted into a weapon or sold.

name: raw meat
description: A chunk of raw meat. Best cooked before eating.

name: spider silk
description: A bundle of strong spider silk. Valuable for crafting and alchemy.

name: spider venom
description: A vial of potent spider venom, carefully extracted. Handle with care.

name: bone fragment
description: A piece of old bone, bleached white by time.

name: old cellar key
description: A rusty iron key that once opened a cellar door.

name: wolf pelt
description: A thick gray wolf pelt, perfect for crafting warm clothing or armor.

name: wolf fang
description: A sharp fang from a Thornwood wolf. Popular with hunters as trophies.

name: spider eye gem
description: A crystallized spider eye that gleams with an inner light. Rare and valuable.

name: bear pelt
description: A massive brown bear pelt. Heavy but incredibly warm and valuable.

name: bear claw
description: A curved claw from a brown bear. Prized by warriors as a trophy.

name: bandit mask
description: A cloth mask worn by forest bandits to hide their identity.

name: hunter's journal
description: A blood-stained journal belonging to an unfortunate hunter. Contains notes about forest dangers.

name: scattered arrows
description: A bundle of arrows salvaged from the abandoned camp. Some are still usable.

name: bundle of stolen goods
description: Various items stolen by bandits - cloth, tools, and trinkets.

name: stolen jewelry
description: Jewelry taken from unlucky travelers. Some pieces are quite valuable.

name: bandit leader's key
description: A key that Scarface kept on his person. It probably opens something valuable.

name: goblin ear
description: A severed goblin ear. The bounty office pays for these.

name: bone shiv
description: A crude weapon made from sharpened bone. Primitive but effective.

name: crude arrows
description: Poorly made arrows with stone tips. They fly crooked but can still hurt.

name: goblin shortbow
description: A small bow made from scavenged materials. Sized for goblin hands but usable by others.

name: shaman's totem
description: A bone totem carved with dark symbols. It pulses with residual magic.

name: dark essence
description: A vial of pure dark energy. Dangerous to handle but valuable to the right buyer.

name: troll blood
description: Thick, regenerative blood harvested from a cave troll. Alchemists prize this.

name: troll hide
description: A section of tough troll hide. Nearly impossible to cut with ordinary weapons.

name: troll's club
description: A tree trunk used as a weapon by the cave troll. Too heavy for most to wield.

name: Grulkak's Crown
description: A macabre crown fashioned from a human skull, decorated with crude gems. A symbol of goblin authority.

name: chieftain's key
description: An ornate key worn by the goblin chieftain. Opens the tribe's treasure vault.

name: goblin treasure key
description: A key to one of the goblin storage chests. Might contain something valuable.

name: goblin shaman's staff
description: A gnarled staff topped with feathers and bones. It hums with dark magic.

name: goblin chieftain's crown
description: The skull crown worn by Grulkak. A gruesome trophy of victory.

name: rotting flesh
description: Decomposing flesh from an undead creature. Disgusting but useful in necromancy.

name: tarnished coin
description: An ancient coin, so corroded its origin is unreadable. Still has some value.

name: bog serpent scale
description: A large, iridescent scale from a bog serpent. Used in armor crafting.

name: bog serpent venom
description: Potent paralytic venom from a bog serpent. Extremely dangerous.

name: serpent fang
description: A long, curved fang from a bog serpent. Could make a deadly dagger.

name: abandoned supplies
description: Supplies left behind by someone who didn't make it out of the marsh.

name: swamp hag's eye
description: A preserved eye from a swamp hag. It seems to follow your movements.

name: cursed pendant
description: A pendant radiating dark energy. Powerful but potentially dangerous to wear.

name: potion of dark vision
description: A murky potion that grants the ability to see in complete darkness.

name: knight's sigil
description: A tarnished sigil from a drowned knight. It bears an ancient noble crest.

name: rusted longsword
description: An ancient longsword, badly rusted but still recognizable as quality work.

name: spectral essence
description: Ethereal energy captured from an undead spirit. Glows with ghostly light.

name: Crown of the Marsh Lord
description: A tarnished crown of ancient make, encrusted with dark gems. It pulses with corrupted power.

name: ancient seal fragment
description: A piece of the seal that keeps something terrible imprisoned. Handle with extreme care.

name: greater healing potion
description: A large vial of bright red liquid. Restores significantly more health than a normal potion.

name: greater mana potion
description: A large vial of bright blue liquid. Restores significantly more mana than a normal potion.

name: antidote
description: A green potion that cures poison. Essential for exploring dangerous areas.

name: scroll of fireball
description: A magical scroll containing the fireball spell. Burns up after use.

name: scroll of healing
description: A magical scroll containing a healing spell. Burns up after use.

name: apprentice wand
description: A simple wand of polished wood. Channels magical energy for novice spellcasters.

name: apprentice staff
description: A wooden staff topped with a small crystal. Standard equipment for magic students.

name: steel dagger
description: A well-balanced steel dagger. Quick and deadly in skilled hands.

name: iron mace
description: A heavy iron mace designed to crush armor and bone alike.

name: iron shield
description: A sturdy iron shield bearing no heraldry. Reliable protection.

name: chainmail hauberk
description: A shirt of interlocking iron rings. Good protection with reasonable mobility.

name: leather backpack
description: A sturdy leather backpack with multiple pouches. Essential for adventuring.

name: Thornwood signet ring
description: A ring bearing the seal of Thornwood Town. Given to those who perform great services for the community.

name: pendant of Aelindra
description: A wooden pendant carved with the symbol of Aelindra, goddess of the harvest. Blessed by the village shrine.

name: cloak of the forest
description: A green and brown cloak that helps the wearer blend into forest environments.

name: swamp strider boots
description: Waterproof boots designed for traveling through marshy terrain.

name: goblin slayer
description: A sword inscribed with runes that glow faintly in the presence of goblins. The edge never seems to dull.

name: marsh ward amulet
description: An amulet that offers protection against the foul miasma of the marsh.

name: training sword
description: A basic sword given to new adventurers. It's not much, but it's a start.

name: letter from Elder Tobias
description: A sealed letter of introduction from the village elder of Millbrook.

name: goblin battle plans
description: Crude maps and scrawled plans showing goblin raid targets. The mayor needs to see this.

name: marsh herb
description: A rare medicinal herb that only grows in the darkest parts of the marsh.
